page.title: 18Adults Leisure Activities
page.content: Here is a list of television programes which were the most popular with the parents of the children from Glapthorn school.The three most popular programes were "DALLAS"which 14 people liked, "DYNASTY" which 5 people liked and the third was the "NEWS"which 7 people liked. Here are the names of the rest of the programes which theyu liked. "MINDER","THE GREAT EGG RACE","THE DETECIVE","CROSSROADS","TOP OF THE POPS","BREAKFAST TIME","WOGAN" "SWEENY","THE PRACTICE","TAKE THE HIGH ROAD","SURVIVAL","MASTERMIND", "Q.E.D.","WORLD ABOUT US","LAST OF THE SUMMER WINE","THE HOT SHOE SHOW","BEST SELLERS","QUESTION TIME","THE MONEY PROGRAME","SPORTS NIGHT","QUESTION OF SPORT","DEMPSEY AND MAKE PEACE","THE PRICE IS RIGHT","BUSMANS HOLIDAY", "FILMS","YOUNG ONES" and "DRAMA ".
